    • Method Detail

      • setMQTTServerDetails

        public void setMQTTServerDetails(java.lang.String mqtt_server,
                                 int mqtt_port)
        The method is to set MQTTServerDetails for the code generation. The default server is http://devicemanager.bevywise.com and port 1883
        Parameters:
        mqtt_server - - The MQTT Server to which the client should communicate.
        mqtt_port - - The port at which the MQTT Server is running.

      • setWifiDetails

        public void setWifiDetails(java.lang.String wifi_SSID,
                           java.lang.String wifi_password)
        This method will be used to set the local access point credentials through which the client will communicate to mqtt server. You can leave this as emptyu and set it on initialization using reset mode. This can be left empty, if you are connecting via GSM.
        Parameters:
        wifi_SSID - - The Access Point name.
        wifi_password - - The password of the Access Point.

      • setDeviceAuthentication

        public void setDeviceAuthentication(java.lang.String mqtt_username,
                                    java.lang.String mqtt_password)
        This method helps you set the MQTT Device authentication credentials into the client. If this is not set during the code generation, you can set it using the reset mode.
        Parameters:
        mqtt_username - - The MQTT Username to connect the client to the mqtt server.
        mqtt_password - - The MQTT Password to be used to connect the client.

      • setDataParams

        public void setDataParams(java.lang.String[] datatype,
                          java.lang.String[] data_params)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        The data params can be set using this method The parameter type supported are int , float and boolean.
        Parameters:
        datatype - - The array of the data types in order
        data_params - - The list of param names.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - for count mismatch.

      • setClient_id

        public void setClient_id(java.lang.String client_id)
        This method will allow you to set the unique client id to the generated agent. If the client id is not given, the class will generate an Unique random UUID string.
        Parameters:
        client_id - - The unique Client id should be given.

      • setTimeInterval

        public void setTimeInterval(int timeInterval)
        This method will allow you to set the time interval between each message The time interval needs to be specified in seconds..
        Parameters:
        timeInterval - - The time interval between each message. Specified in seconds.

      • setClient_Variable

        public void setClient_Variable(java.lang.String client_id_param)
        This will be called with the parameter key name for the client identified if this want to be part of the JSON response.
        Parameters:
        client_id_param - - The parameter name to be set for the client identified in the JSON message of the device

      • setTimerVariable

        public void setTimerVariable(java.lang.String timer_param)
        The method use the set the timer variable for setting the current time in the JSON Message.
        Parameters:
        timer_param - - The parameter key name of the time to be sent on the JSON Message

      • setTopic

        public void setTopic(java.lang.String topic)
        This method is used to set the topic name of the mqtt message which is used for publishing the data.
        Parameters:
        topic - - the name of the topic.

      • generateCPP

        public void generateCPP()
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        This method will generate the code for the main cpp file.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - for File Writing failure

      • getValueFromCommandLine

        public java.lang.String getValueFromCommandLine(java.lang.String toPrint)
                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        This method will be used to get the value from the command prompt based on the need. This is an internal method.
        Parameters:
        toPrint - - The Description of the field need as input from the customer.
        Returns:
        String - The value given by the user for the requested details.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - for File reading
